title: Las Vegas Mayor on Potential Athletics Relocation, Sports Betting
itunes:title: Las Vegas Mayor on Potential Athletics Relocation, Sports Betting
description:
Michael Barr and Mike Lynch speak with Las Vegas Mayor Carolyn Goodman, about the explosive growth of professional sports in Las Vegas, and the evolution of legal sports betting.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
